gameplay.gameobject.bomberman

Interface BombermanInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Bomberman

    public interface BombermanInterface
    Interface which characterizes all of bomberman's functionality.
    Author:
    MF

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canBombPass() 
      boolean canDetonateBomb() 
      boolean canTakeTheHeat() 
      void detonateBomb()
      Detonates the oldest bomb on the board if bomberman has the detonator powerup.
      void die()
      Causes bomberman to die when called, reduces bomberman's lives by 1 and respawns him/
      int getBombLimit() 
      int getBombRadius() 
      void increaseBombLimit()
      Increases bomberman's bomb limit by 1.
      void increaseExplosionRadius()
      Increases bomberman's bomb explosion radius by 1 block.
      void increaseMoveSpeed()
      increase the speed at which bomberman moves by a given amount.
      void moveToNextLevel()
      Bomberman triggers a movement to the next level, this method is a wrapper for the method on the world class
      void placeBomb()
      Places a bomb on the game map at Bombermna's feet
      void setBombPass(boolean bombPass)
      Set bomberman's ability to pass through bombs
      void setDetonator(boolean detonator)
      Set if bombermna has a remote detonator.
      void setFlamePass(boolean flamePass)
      Set bomberman's ability to pass through fire
      void setWallPass(boolean wallPass)
      Set Bombermna's ability to pass through walls.

    • Method Detail

      • canDetonateBomb

        boolean canDetonateBomb()
        Returns:
        true if Bomberman can remotely detonate bombs else false.

      • getBombLimit

        int getBombLimit()
        Returns:
        the total number of bombs allowed to be dropped.

      • getBombRadius

        int getBombRadius()
        Returns:
        the radius of the bombs that bomberman drops

      • canBombPass

        boolean canBombPass()
        Returns:
        true if Bomberman can pass through bombs, else fase.

      • increaseExplosionRadius

        void increaseExplosionRadius()
        Increases bomberman's bomb explosion radius by 1 block.

      • increaseBombLimit

        void increaseBombLimit()
        Increases bomberman's bomb limit by 1.

      • canTakeTheHeat

        boolean canTakeTheHeat()
        Returns:
        true if bomberman is immune to bomb fire, else false.

      • setWallPass

        Set Bombermna's ability to pass through walls.

        wallPass - boolean of true or false.
